body.header: You should spend about 40 minutes on this task. You should write at least 250 words.

div.p: Present a written argument or case to an educated reader with no specialist knowledge of the following topic.

p.b: The tourist industry has grown enormously over the last fifty years, and there are few places which are unaffected by it. However, tourism rarely benefits the countries which tourists visit.
To what extent do you agree or disagree?

div.p: You should use your own ideas, knowledge and experience and support your arguments with examples and relevant evidence.
